#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef std::pair<long int,long int> my_pair;
bool cmp(const my_pair& left, const my_pair& right)
{return left.second < right.second;}

int main()
{
    int t;long int n,cnt,start,end,i,curr_finish_time;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    scanf("%ld",&n);cnt=0;curr_finish_time=0;
    vector <my_pair> a; vector <my_pair>::iterator it;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
     scanf("%ld %ld",&start,&end);
     a.push_back(my_pair(start,end));
    }
    sort(a.begin(),a.end(),cmp);
    for(it=a.begin();it!=a.end();it++)
    {
        if(it->first>=curr_finish_time){cnt++;curr_finish_time=it->second;}
    }
    printf("%ld\n",cnt);
    }
 return 0;
}
